howItWorks.title: How SweetSpots Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Planning your trip should feel fun!

swipe.title: Swipe Your Vibe
swipe.description: We'll show you curated spots that match your mood, budget, and distance — no endless tabs, just swipe right on what you like.

build.title: Build Your Dream Itinerary
build.description: Every swipe you love goes into your Saved Spots. When you're ready, pick your top choices and we'll auto-generate an itinerary that makes sense (no zigzag routes or 2-hour gaps).

share.title: Share With The Crew
share.description: Send your itinerary to friends — they can vote yes/no on activities, so everyone's on the same page. No more "I thought we weren't doing that?" energy.

cta.title: Be the first to try SweetSpots
cta.description:
We're cooking up something made for travelers like you. Drop your email and we'll let you know when we launch.
No spam, no pressure — just better trips.

footer.description: From inspo to itinerary — discover and plan your perfect trip in one place. Made for travelers who want better trips, not more stress.

razak.name: Muhammad Ilham Razak
razak.bio: Razak is a business development executive currently studying for a Master of Business at Monash University. Razak has over 5 years of experience in business development, sales, and marketing. Razak is an LPDP scholarship recipient for 2024-2026.

farizio.name: Farizio Kautsar Heruzy
farizio.bio: Farizio is a Master of Information Technology student at Monash University with over 3 years of experience in technology startups, including serving as a full stack developer in various positions.

kasipang.name: Kasipang Phantajak
kasipang.bio: Kao is a UI/UX designer with over 3 years of experience in startups in Thailand. Kao is currently pursuing a Master of Business at Monash University.

dennis.name: Dennis Dafeng
dennis.bio: Dennis is a filmmaker and content producer with experience in commercial storytelling and brand marketing across Australia and the U.S. He is the founder of Spotlight HD Media and is currently pursuing a Master of Business (Entrepreneurship) at Monash University.
